public class PC
extends ComponentListener
This class represents a Program Counter (PC)

Version:
0.1
Author:
Beno Kurmann, Michel Marti

ID
Id of the Program Counter

PC(int)
Constructs a new Program counter

getCounter()
Return the current PC value
increment()
Increment the PC by 1
reset()
reset's the PC to 0
setCounter(int)
Set the PC

ID 
 public static final String ID
Id of the Program Counter

PC 
 public PC(int max)
Constructs a new Program counter

Parameters:
max - The maximum value that the PC may reach. If the PC exceeds this value, it will reset to 0

reset 
 public void reset() throws IOException
reset's the PC to 0
